name: GlobalPitch
overview:
At GlobalPitch it’s all about you! We are the Internet destination where job seekers have a platform to rise above the millions of other candidates. With GlobalPitch you can convey to your future employer your personality and “soft skills”. GlobalPitch was created to benefit job seekers, hiring managers and recruiters.

GlobalPitch was created to benefit job seekers, hiring managers and recruiters.

If you are looking for a new job you are now empowered by GlobalPitch with a rich media platform that gives you the tools to let your true potential shine. Show off your past accomplishments and future potential. Create your profile, manage it, and distribute your profile along with your resume. When you apply for a job, separate yourself from the stack by including a link to your career profile.

If you are recruiting new talent, encourage your candidates to complete their career profile at GlobalPitch.com. GlobalPitch will save you time by enabling you to make better informed decisions about who you invite in to the interview process.
